content:
## MARKET OVERVIEW

1. What is the Current Market Regime?
RISK-ON: low volatility (Vol: 15.8%) and broad participation (Breadth: 6/8), supportive risk appetite and cyclical leadership. Expect continuation of momentum while USD/TRY and global rates stay benign.

2. Which sectors are leading?
Retail & Food and Heavy Industry are running hard; Retail: MGROS (1W: +11.59% | 1M: +14.18%) ABOVE TREND, BIMAS (1W: +11.33% | 1M: +14.42%) ABOVE TREND; Heavy Industry: ASELS (1W: +21.63% | 1M: +36.05%) ABOVE TREND and TOASO (1W: +6.67% | 1M: +17.95%) ABOVE TREND.

3. Which sectors are lagging?
Technology & Telecom and Construction & REIT lag; KONTR (1W: -11.78% | 1M: -27.91%) BELOW TREND anchors Tech weakness while TKFEN (1W: -1.17% | 1M: +7.33%) CORRECTION and ALARK (1W: -3.89% | 1M: +6.52%) CORRECTION keep construction choppy.

## STOCK PERFORMANCE

4. Top Performing Stocks?
ASELS (1W: +21.63% | 1M: +36.05%) ABOVE TREND, MGROS (1W: +11.59% | 1M: +14.18%) ABOVE TREND, BIMAS (1W: +11.33% | 1M: +14.42%) ABOVE TREND, TRMET (1W: +10.28% | 1M: +17.46%) ABOVE TREND, SOKM (1W: +8.05% | 1M: +7.96%) ABOVE TREND.

5. Worst Performing Stocks?
SASA (1W: -18.34% | 1M: -18.06%) BELOW TREND, KONTR (1W: -11.78% | 1M: -27.91%) BELOW TREND, HEKTS (1W: -5.41% | 1M: -7.19%) BELOW TREND, ALARK (1W: -3.89% | 1M: +6.52%) CORRECTION, GARAN (1W: -2.81% | 1M: +4.15%) CORRECTION.

6. Momentum Stocks?
Big swings: ASELS (1W: +21.63% | 1M: +36.05%) ABOVE TREND, SASA (1W: -18.34% | 1M: -18.06%) BELOW TREND, MGROS (1W: +11.59% | 1M: +14.18%) ABOVE TREND, BIMAS (1W: +11.33% | 1M: +14.42%) ABOVE TREND, TRMET (1W: +10.28% | 1M: +17.46%) ABOVE TREND.

## SECTOR OUTLOOK

7. Banking Sector Outlook?
Banks show mild participation; HALKB (1W: +6.90% | 1M: +11.96%) ABOVE TREND leads while AKBNK (1W: +0.41% | 1M: +7.50%) ABOVE TREND is steady and GARAN (1W: -2.81% | 1M: +4.15%) CORRECTION needs to re-establish momentum.

8. Industrial Sector Outlook?
Heavy Industry remains constructive: ASELS (1W: +21.63% | 1M: +36.05%) ABOVE TREND, TOASO (1W: +6.67% | 1M: +17.95%) ABOVE TREND and EREGL (1W: +1.82% | 1M: +2.15%) ABOVE TREND support cyclical positioning.

9. Energy & Chemicals Outlook?
Mixed; TRMET (1W: +10.28% | 1M: +17.46%) ABOVE TREND and GUBRF (1W: +6.54% | 1M: +15.31%) ABOVE TREND outperform while SASA (1W: -18.34% | 1M: -18.06%) BELOW TREND is a clear laggard and risk to the group.

## PORTFOLIO STRATEGY

10. Portfolio Recommendation?
Overweight Retail & Food and select Heavy Industry names to ride momentum; trim Technology & Telecom exposure and avoid weak chemicals like SASA until technical recovery. Manage position sizes for large single-stock moves (ASELS, SASA).

## NEXT WEEK OUTLOOK

11. Stocks to Watch Next Week?
ASELS (1W: +21.63% | 1M: +36.05%) ABOVE TREND, BIMAS (1W: +11.33% | 1M: +14.42%) ABOVE TREND, TRMET (1W: +10.28% | 1M: +17.46%) ABOVE TREND, KONTR (1W: -11.78% | 1M: -27.91%) BELOW TREND, SASA (1W: -18.34% | 1M: -18.06%) BELOW TREND.

12. Sectors to Watch Next Week?
Retail & Food and Heavy Industry for upside continuation; Technology & Telecom for downside risk and potential volatility spillover.

13. Key Levels & Triggers?
Watch XU100 reaction to global rate headlines, US CPI and USD/TRY; confirmation above recent highs would validate RISK-ON, while a break on liquidity or FX shock would flip flows quickly.

EXECUTIVE SUMMARY
RISK-ON market: low vol (15.8%) and 6/8 sectors positive with clear leadership from Retail & Food and Heavy Industry (ASELS, MGROS, BIMAS). Opportunities in cyclicals; key risk remains concentrated downside in weak tech/chemicals (KONTR, SASA) that could trigger short-term reversals.
